channel.title: Graphics on Denis Labrecque
channel.description: Recent content in Graphics on Denis Labrecque

item.title: Scale Air Apparel
item.description: This apparel was created and branded for the Ad Design campaign of Scale Air, a model airplane show in Montreal. It is designed to be sold as a fundraiser at the event. It was first sketched out on paper, then made in Illustrator and mocked up in Photoshop.

item.title: Asian Garden
item.description: I created this scene to challenge myself to represent nature. It taught me how to use software light, and how to texture natural elements like water to make a good-looking render. An asset software called Bridge helped speed the composition process, and the image was rendered from Blender.
